description: Use this API to obtain the seller's total free balance details of their ads credit (including the post credits and free credits)

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned when registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 1 minute.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, used to identify your permission to use. Valid for multiple uses and expires in 4 hours

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for seller

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id and auth_timestamp, concatenated with partner_key. For more details about how to generate the auth_token, check this page.

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Error code, empty when no error returned

response_fields.name: warning
response_fields.description: Warning from current request message, not the warning

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: request id to trace for each request

response_fields.name: total_balance
response_fields.description: This is to indicate the total free balance, including paid credit and free credits
